name: smartthings-smartapp
description: JavaScript/TypeScript library for using SmartThings APIs
author: Joseph M. Deming

scripts.lint: concurrently -n "client:lint,server:lint" -c "white,gray" "cd client && yarn lint" "cd server && yarn lint"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "server:tunnel,server:host,client:start" -c "blue,cyan,green" "cd server && yarn tunnel" "cd server && yarn start" "cd client && yarn start"
